content:
In the south of Ukraine, forces of defense during the day were eliminated by another 142 invaders and destroyed many enemy equipment, among which, in particular, the anti-aircraft missile complexes "Thor-M2" and howitzer "MSTA-B".

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

During the day, confirmation was obtained that the enemy has become less than:

  • 142 invaders;
  • 1 Thor-M2 anti-aircraft missile complex;
  • 6 Holat, in T.S. MSTA-B ";
  • 2 mortars;
  • 1 boat;
  • 4 portable complexes of radio electronic struggle;
  • 24 units of autobroetens.

In addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 2 felds of ammunition.

As reportedArmyinform, in the day, the enemy minus 1160 invaders, 11 tanks and 28 artsystems.
title: “Ukrainian soldiers have broken the enemy SCR“ Thor-M2 ”and howitzers“ MSTA-B ”
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. The confirmation was received during the day ...
author: Army Inform
